title: Planet Earth: Understanding and Protecting our Environment
description: Learn about the physical geography of Earth and discover how to use this knowledge to protect our natural environment.
learning_outcomes: Understand Earth's physical geography. Learn how to apply geographical knowledge to protect the natural environment. Develop an awareness of sustainability.

title: Planet Earth: Understanding and Protecting our Environment
description: Learn about the physical geography of Earth and discover how to use this knowledge to protect our natural environment.
learning_outcomes: Understand Earth's physical geography and apply this knowledge to protect our natural environment. Explore key concepts related to climate change and sustainability.

title: Intermediate German: Countries and Landscapes
description: Examine the human and physical geography of German-speaking countries and the language used to discuss them.
prerequisites: Familiarity with basic German grammar and vocabulary
learning_outcomes: Understand and discuss the human and physical geography of German-speaking countries. Enhance German language skills related to describing landscapes and cultural aspects. Improve vocabulary and communication abilities in German.

title: Intermediate French: People and Places
description: Gain an introduction to the physical and human geography of France and explore the language used to speak about them.
prerequisites: Ability to understand simple spoken and written French
learning_outcomes: Understand the physical and human geography of France. Develop language skills to discuss geographical topics. Expand vocabulary related to places and people in France. Improve comprehension of French in context.

title: Planet Earth: Understanding and Protecting our Environment
description: Learn about the physical geography of Earth and discover how to use this knowledge to protect our natural environment.
